statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Mexican Shade Grown coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${8.90} per pound with some Queen City coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${11.50} per pound to create \displaystyle{100} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${9.94} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
pounds of Mexican Shade Grown coffee.
